website_summaries.verdict: While you are likely to be impressed with its performance, this model comes with some quality concerns.
pros: Impresses with its ability to suction cooking fumes, smoke, and odors thanks to the powerful 900 CFM action it delivers
cons: Some of the parts feel flimsy
Malfunctioning of various components after months of use reported

customer_reviews.title: Beware of bright blue light produced by control buttons.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. I will say that its very powerful and not too loud. The one major negative is that the control buttons are a bright piercing blue and I'm literally blinded every time I look at them. According to the manufacture there is no way to turn off or turn down the blue lights. They are so bright that they light up the wall on the opposite side of my kitchen. The control panel is just weird in general- the buttons don't completely make sense. Had I known about the blue lights before hand I would not have purchased this hood. Even for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ray

customer_reviews.title: Customer service nil
customer_reviews.text: We'll, here's a product update. This unit was installed in December 2017. Other than the blue display lights being extremely bright - it functioned properly- a little bit on the noisy side and that's it. We noticed the fan speed and timer display had almost disappeared. My husband has left 4 voicemails and 2 emails to the manufacturer directly without reply. This occurred for a period of two weeks. This product would have received 3 stars. However, customer service is just as important as the product. Hence, the one star review.
customer_reviews.author: T. T

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money ($360). Bought mine for a remodel, and it's as advertised. For me, range hoods should be powerful, quiet and not too expensive. This one hits on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKuts

customer_reviews.title: Great Range Hood Fan - 5 stars to 1 or myabe less. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Update 12.2019: Electronics went out just short of my 2 year anniversary. No warning signs, but just stopped working. Did not realize this brand only had a 1 year warranty so I'm completely out of luck. Bought a similar one that has a 3 year warranty. Reading through the comments, my guess is I would have had difficulty with customer service regardless. Changing my 5 start initial review to 1 for early fail and no warranty to stand behind. Original Review: Fantastic over oven hood. Very powerful and looks great. Even on the lowest speeds I have found this to have tremendous ability to work well and it's relatively quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pava

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Looks awesome and feels solid. The buttons are kinda weird though. Capacitive touch buttons with no real feedback, and the sensitivity is weird on them. You almost need to touch and hold for a second. I'd prefer different buttons, but I'd probably buy again anyway for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Hood light low mode stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: The low mode for the hood lights stopped working after a week of installation. Only bright mode works and I do not want to take the entire hood down to send it back. Like the look of the hood but disappointed in quality. And, as reported in other reviews, those blue LED lights are blindingly bright. Update: no effort from the manufacturer to remedy the issue with the low light mode not working. I would have returned the hood after the light stopped working, however it was going to be too much trouble. If you purchase this hood, you are on your own.
customer_reviews.author: eBizman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Tested out of the box and powerfull yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Tested out of the box and powerfull yet quiet for a 760 cfm unit. Minimal vibration but would pay attention while installing venting flexible duct, would likely wrap this duct in insulation material to make sure there would be absolutely no noise from it! Operation from various touch buttons is seamless and light is powerfull enough yet not too bright..... Pretty anxious to put it up there!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: THE REJ

customer_reviews.title: Noise and does not vacuum grease to catcher!
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very noise and the grease catcher does not work at all. Grease dripd at the sided of motor instead. Had to wipe the grease off with paper towel every couple days from the bottom of the motor. Cabinet has grease all over! This should not happening at all with a 900 cfm motor. Nice hood and design. Installation was easy, make sure it's leveled.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Great stove accessory
customer_reviews.text: Installed unit with my son's help. Had the same previous unit with a larger chimney but the fan motor quit. The new unit works and looks good. We had about 3 months of no fan and our house smelled. Now we are back to great cooking (garlic & all). Also the three filters should be great- my last unit had 2 filters and in opening up the previous exhaust they were clean. Probably because I cleaned at every prescribed interval.
customer_reviews.author: Heinz M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really nice looking and I love the 2 level light and the deep indigo lights on the front. I would buy it again for the great price!! The company also stood behind it when I needed only one little screw to match one of the stainless screws that I lost, they sent me the whole set of install screws and no hassle! I'm not sure if there are quieter range hoods or just that my place is a bit on the small size, so it may seem a little louder than others to me but I have not listened to many anyway. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great hood bad filters
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but the filters are not. If you remove the filters and wash them the retaining clip that holds them in place will break. This seems to be a consistent problem since there is a 6-8 week back order on replacement filters, and they do not take pre orders or put you on a wait list so be careful when selecting this product
customer_reviews.author: B. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, lighting is good, fan sound is good but a piece of the metal underneath in the back was thinly tacked and had came lose which made the filter sag down. I didn’t notice it until it was installed and the filter was hanging so I ran a stainless screw through it so I wouldn’t have to take down and return and wait on another one. If this wouldn’t have happened it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great hood design -  non-existent customer support and service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this range hood for kitchen remodel. Electrician installing noticed that unit did not power up properly and found that plug for circuit board was loose. Unit worked fine for a few weeks then intermittently would power down and not restart. Circuit board has short that resets when power is disconnected. Multiple calls over the past month have had several promises to send new circuit board, but still no arrival. Poor communication, poor follow-up, no system to support this product to resolve a simple issue.
customer_reviews.author: Foxtrotter

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for 6 months and one of the bulbs burnt out 2 months ago! I just finished talking to Cavalier customer service and they said they'd send me the $7.50 bulb but I had to cover the $10 shipping! Um, I'm good thanks. Also, just like other reviewers, the led lights on the front are so ridiculously bright and blinding. It is pretty but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: The Jones'

customer_reviews.title: Display controls, lights, fan failed within 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Display controls, lights, fan failed within 1 month. Don’t know what to do with it now. Is there any customer service? I even purchased extended warranty
customer_reviews.author: techgeek

customer_reviews.title: Hood does not work at all.  Supplier cannot find my order.
customer_reviews.text: Hood does not work. This is inconvenient and a loss. Electrician confirmed there is power, but the hood lights and fan do not power on. Return window is too short for a major remodel. We installed it in April shortly after we ordered it, but the electrician did provide power until July 11, so now I cannot return it. I've come to the conclusion that an online order like this is not appropriate for a major remodel that goes on for months. It is much better to buy locally when you are remodeling, so you can get service and support. I am learning local suppliers will match online prices if you ask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works bad
customer_reviews.text: The unit turns itself on and off. Customer service has sent me parts to install. The symptoms changed a bit but the unit still does not work right; it shuts itself off while cooking. Now they want me to shoot a video of the problem...how do you take a video of a fan that shuts off once in a while? It's a big deal to remove it and get another one. Do not buy these units, they are unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Mounting height determines overall efficiency and comfortability
customer_reviews.text: Stylish but loud, six speed ,high and low lighting. Ventilation up and out of the kitchen option. Should've had an optional vent motor location to reduce decibel levels even lower.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Damon

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOve it!!! The blue lights are painfully bright but still awesome! You don’t have to push the buttons with ANY force you just put your finger on top of it and it turns on and each tap cycles through it’s exhaust settings or brightness settings.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Parents... seriously

customer_reviews.title: Love my new hood
customer_reviews.text: Great exhaust hood - I use it whenever I am cooking - 6 speeds allow you to use just what you need - light is perfect for cooking or just a night light - very easy to keep clean, just wipe it off - looks great - so glad I chose this hood - great price
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install; functions well and looks elegant
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is easy to install. In fact, it only took two screws to the wall and then hang it on them, just like hanging a picture. Nonetheless, the hood is well equipped for its function. I had installed at least three hoods by myself in the past because of moving, this one is quite powerful and relatively quiet. The outlook is elegant and nice. My wife was excited to see the hood was put on since that's her domain. She is very happy on using this hood.
customer_reviews.author: Crescent

customer_reviews.title: at just over 2 years, it is making a ...
customer_reviews.text: at just over 2 years, it is making a rumbling noise (like the fan is not stably rotating). it is probably affecting the suction strength
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a high end vent that is easy toinstall and works wonderful. No more smoky meals. lol
customer_reviews.author: fred s

customer_reviews.title: Quick and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy Easy to assemble. Wish the chimney's would have been taller. I have a 9 foot ceiling and we had to improvise in adding a wooden block middle section to make it reach the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: A month later, hood fan stopped working. LCD Screen is black out. fan shut off automatically when I press any buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Eundaeng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: Have used it heavily on daily basis and it’s still holding up great. Very powerful, but quiet fan. The 6 settings that are available work really well. Also looks very attractive. Recommend it for any stove and particularly if you have a gas stove to whisk away any unburned vapors.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred M.

customer_reviews.title: Blinding button lights
customer_reviews.text: It’s VERY nice looking and works well but I should have listened to the review that talks about the blinding blue lights. They really are like lasers shining in your eyes! I’m just glad I don’t need to use it all the time. The price is good but I need to figure out a way to dim the lights!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit .......but was short grease tray , nobody has responded to my concern , after submitting request
customer_reviews.author: pkary

customer_reviews.title: Nice hood!
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy install,, quiet, and effective packaged awesome.. UPDATE broken display... does not come on. no way to set timer. No response to contact effort
customer_reviews.author: Manfred K. Dulle

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: This product is still working well 6 months later and has a powerful suction. The filters could be improved upon as mine were mesh and not baffle, but the motor is fantastic and does a great job of removing grease build up. The touch display works well and no issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: sseegobin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only used about a dozen times since the purchase last year. The display no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Darthbader

customer_reviews.title: Nice and powerful
customer_reviews.text: best thing in my house , no smell of Indian food or I should say no smell of food .
customer_reviews.author: GujjuInAtl

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very quiet. Only issue is that lights are not bright enough
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Piper

customer_reviews.title: I just installed it yesterday and it really was very easy. The heavier gauge metal is worth the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with stainless materials and fabrication all my life and the quality and workmanship of this unit is exceptional. I just installed it yesterday and it really was very easy. The heavier gauge metal is worth the extra cost.The fan noise is not bad at all and the lighting is superb. I would recommend this unit to anyone looking for quality and a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Steve, Ky.                          NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: The product was delivered to us damaged. One of ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered to us damaged. One of the top part is broken. I need support from Amazon or seller on how I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalissa

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and fan has no power at highest setting, I dont believe the fan is 900 CFM. Piece of junk, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul S. Syed

customer_reviews.title: Smell in my kitchen is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my New cavalier... The smell when I'm cooking is gone!! Sooo happy My brothers recommend it to me and other sister and now we all have one. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used to like this range hood
customer_reviews.text: I used to like this range hood,but after six months it's nothing but problems. The range hood turns off by itself when trying to change the fan settings. The display went out called customer service and received a new display but I'm just waiting for it to fail again and I know it will after the warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Uli

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the customer service and the delivery. It came on time and I now have it installed in my kitchen. I'm looking forward to enjoying it for many years. Thanks again for this outstanding product! Sincerely, - Leli P.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This hood is quiet and works well. It looks very nice in our kitchen. Very satisfied! I only wish the power control button LED lights were modified from ultra bright.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great good range
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hood range, plenty of power, installed it myself and that was a bit of work, not bad overall.
customer_reviews.author: John Borsheim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great lighting could be better
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! The only negative is that the lights are set to far to the rear of the unit making it ineffective lighting in the front of the range
customer_reviews.author: Edward Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. Looks great,, works great. I recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tax Lady

customer_reviews.title: Look no farther
customer_reviews.text: I looked at every hood on the market and this one was by far, the best value. When we put it in we were amazed. Not only is it stylish, but it has the quality of one 3 times the price. I love the controls and I find it outs out plenty of light. I love the numerous speeds and it runs very quiet compared to others I have owned in the past. Shipping was fast and it came without a blemish
customer_reviews.author: Tambra P. Colston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, Nice lights and the fan is not very loud . Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: tucker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one, not use it every day, broken in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: W. Xue

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great! Have had for a few weeks and love ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Have had for a few weeks and love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I really like this range hood
customer_reviews.text: I really like this range hood, but it scratches very very easily. We were very careful, but when we extended the part that goes up to the ceiling, we still got two long scratches. Everything else worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: check to see if it actually works before installing
customer_reviews.text: looks great but exhaust fan not wired correctly blows in stead of sucking up air.
customer_reviews.author: silverlady

customer_reviews.title: A great hood.
customer_reviews.text: This hood is equal if not better than major name brands. The price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lindblom

customer_reviews.title: Its better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Its better than i expected. Beautiful and powerful. I would have given a 5 star but it was missing a part (Grease cup). Good customer service. Sent out the missing part no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions have no pictures of what the parts are meant to look like and are not clear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, strong, take 99 % of your cooking small out ...Higley recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Manpreet Chahal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Very powerful working great
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this about a month. So far so good. Very powerful working great. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Subrata Saha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with how fast the order came waiting for drywall to be finished to install.looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, good quality. Buttons are backlit blue led. Way too bright. it hurts to look at them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Installed and brokenin 5 seconds. Trying to contact the seller but it says unavailable
customer_reviews.author: Justin Yermouth

customer_reviews.title: This is better than all the ones I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: This is very stylish, powerful, 6 speed, low noise.I used to buy Asian brand, but this one is even better, stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: JaneC

customer_reviews.title: Already burnt out light bulb!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome! The strength of suckage is incredible. Didn’t like the final look of the chimney so I made a temporary one for now.
customer_reviews.author: Cline

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this range hood!
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments everytime people come into our kitchen on how nice our hood is. It's sleek, quiet, and so easy to clean. For all that it does and the quality, it's very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonsfly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great. Only complaint is lowest fan setting is still rather loud.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P Benson

customer_reviews.title: good range
customer_reviews.text: It is new and seem to be perfect. However, I just put it in my kitchen , so I need to know how its work i about one year. For now looks perfect and good.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: First rate appliance.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy piece of equipment. The fan is very effective and relatively quiet at all settings. Easy to install. The fan control is confusing. If you do things in the wrong order the fan doesn't run.
customer_reviews.author: jimd

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Vent Hood
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and as expensive as units costing 50% more, I agree with the others who have posted that there is no way it is moving the ammt. of air claimed by manufacturer. Easy install and controls are very straight forward. Great update to our newly remodeled kitchen. Would buy again and reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice range hood
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the look and the power. Install was too much for us in the end. Chimney piece was too long and had to have machine cut to fit. Lights are very warm, would prefer LED's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like it has enough power for our cooking application but ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing, seems like it has enough power for our cooking application but the it would have been better if the lights were at the front instead of the rear.
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: great product, quiet for the power it generates
customer_reviews.text: great product, poor install instructions (the internal flapper closure is not included on how to install) but look, performance, value is excellent. the 6 fan speeds are great and the filter screens are very nice in look and to install/clean. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: abtitus

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good installed. But noisy when fan is on the higher settings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is powerful, but we don't like the lights located in the back.
customer_reviews.text: it is powerful but the lights are located in the very back side, which is not very useful, and make the backsplash looks bad.... The touch button look nice but sometimes tricky to use.
customer_reviews.author: JYS

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Product was installed less than 30 days ago. The power button does not work. If it actually turns on it won't turn off. Most of the time will not turn on. VERY Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about ordering a product like this without being able to see, touch, or feel it, especially considering the price! After shopping my local stores I came back and ordered this range hood with my fingers crossed. It finished our total kitchen remodel and is the final piece of bling that finishes the look. My contractor was quite impressed with the air it sucks out of the room! For the price you cannot go wrong with this hood!!! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: LarrynSam

customer_reviews.title: from what we can see it looks great! Packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for us it is still in the box.... kitchen remodel not complete yet. But, from what we can see it looks great! Packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl green

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month installed and is not working. My contractor says there's power and buttons are not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean sleek easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Put it it up in about 2 hours. It's very quiet, very high end looking. Install is done with a level screwdriver and Sheetrock saw. With another set of hands the average DIY person could have it installed in no time. Overall very happy with the product and the look for my kitchen. All my guests are very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: The review of product can only be useful once it has been used it various settings
customer_reviews.text: The review of product can only be useful once it has been used it various settings, to fully test out the capabilities. That said, this product passed all tests with flying colours. First off, the cuisine is SriLankan Tamil cooking, which is 100 times stronger than any flavour of North or South indian cooking. This unit handles all the heat, steam and smells with ease, and advertises the menu to the entire neighborhood. To give an idea about the power of the unit, you can smell the cooking odors 150ft away from the house. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT FOR ANY HOMEOWNER WHO WANTS TO EXTEND THE LIFE OF THE KITCHEN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Security 101

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that performs well and looking good while doing its job
customer_reviews.text: I brought two of these hoods, one for my previous house which I've sold, and another one for my current residence (they are two different sizes). Both of them performed beautifully. They kept the kitchen free of grease from cooking (Asian household, cooking everyday) much better than other brands that I've used or heard from family and friends. Surprisingly quiet considering its power, of course there will be noises when you turn up to its max setting, but I rarely had to. Easy to clean, just dishwash the metal filters and wipe the exterior with damp towels. One of my best buys around the house hands down.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Well-built, quiet, and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: Everything you're looking for! This is a really heavy duty range hood, but it's still very quiet even at high speed and almost silent at low speed. The halogen lights are warm and bright, with a full-range dimmer and memory. It would probably be better to have them in the front, but they're bright enough to light up the whole cook surface. The controls and LED display pack a lot of adjustments into an elegant, uncluttered, and easy to use panel. The lines are strong, and it looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Flasssshy !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice hood. The design and strength are what I expected. The front buttons activate the controls with the sense of your touch. Timer feature is a little tough to figure out on your own. Had to refer to the user guide for that.
customer_reviews.author: GREG M FRIEDMAN

product_meta.title: Cavaliere SV218B2-30 Wall Mount Range Hood with 900 CFM in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Designed to elevate your cooking prowess in sleek style, the Cavaliere-Euro 30W in. Wall Mounted Range Hood is a stunning addition to your kitchen. This wall-mounted range hood is made of 19-gauge brushed stainless steel for a contemporary, commercial kitchen look. Its dual chamber motor is as quiet as it is efficient at clearing the air. The two dimmable halogen lights and touch sensitive keypad make it a breeze to use. Additional Information: 6 speeds with timer function Touch sensitive LCD keypad with easy-read blue lighting Dishwasher-safe aluminum mesh grease filters Airflow: 900 CFM centrifugal blower 2 dimmable, 35-watt halogen lights 30-hour cleaning reminder 1-15-minute programmable delayed power auto shut-off About Cavaliere Cavaliere offers a complete stainless steel range hood collection. They blend superior components with the latest technologies to create range hoods that cater to your needs. Cavaliere has a special understanding of the kitchen environment, ergonomics, aesthetics, and integration within your home or workplace. They specialize in wall-mounted, island, or under cabinet range hoods that make a statement in your kitchen. 19-gauge stainless steel wall-mounted range hood. 218W low-noise dual-chamber motor (level: 25 dB to 56 dB). Telescopic chimney fits up to 9-ft. ceilings. Dishwasher-safe aluminum mesh filters. 6-inch round duct vent. Dimensions: 30W x 19.69D x 30.17H inches. 1-year parts warranty.
feature_bullets: ✅ EXQUISITE FINISH: Beautifully designed range hood allows an aesthetic cooking experience and a clean kitchen environment with effective ventilation. 19-gauge brushed stainless-steel design is highly durable due to its heat resistant nature

✅ ROBUST EXHAUST: 900 CFM centrifugal motor eliminates toxic pollutants from the kitchen air. Fan noise level is lowest at 25 dB & maximum at 56 dB. Aluminium mesh filters absorb grease, moisture, steam, and odors providing 360° exhaust solution

✅ SMART FEATURES: Electronic Control Panel with LCD display allows the user to adjust various functions such as 2 dimmable 35-watt halogen lights, 6 fan speeds with a timer option, a 1-15 minute programmable delayed power shut off and a 30-hour cleaning reminder

✅ WALL-MOUNT DESIGN: The pyramid design is strengthened by an appealing tall telescopic chimney that fits up to 9 ft. high ceilings giving a scintillating finish. 6-inch round duct is required to fit-in vent exhaust to provide smooth external ventilation

✅ 100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We stand behind all of our high-quality products and offer a 1 Year limited manufacturer’s warranty with 30 days’ hassle-free return policy. The USA based personalized customer support

specifications.Manufacturer Warranty: 5 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY- A reliable 5 year warranty on all our range hoods along with an unparalleled USA based customer support system.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars132 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
